title: 用ItemStack实例物品，后台报错
author: jiangzizhong
txt_content:
我是这样写的： ItemStack 蘑菇煲 = new ItemStack(Material.MUSHROOM_STEW);


然后后台就报错，我实在是不懂是什么意思。

报错信息：
org.bukkit.plugin.AuthorNagException: No legacy enum constant for MUSHROOM_STEW. Did you forget to define api-version: 1.13 in your plugin.yml?

版本：1.13

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 森林蝙蝠 于 2018-8-13 09:43 编辑 

No legacy enum constant for MUSHROOM_STEW. Did you forget to define api-version: 1.13 in your plugin.yml?
第一行其实已经说清楚了，你的plugin.yml里没有指定api-version是1.13，而且1.13不一定有MUSHROOM_STEW这个常量。
而且ItemStack 蘑菇煲……不要使用中文做变量名。

replies.author: jiangzizhong
replies.txt_content:
森林蝙蝠 发表于 2018-8-13 09:30
No legacy enum constant for MUSHROOM_STEW. Did you forget to define api-version: 1.13 in your plugin ...
那样怎么做呢？？求指教！

replies.author: jiangzizhong
replies.txt_content:
森林蝙蝠 发表于 2018-8-13 09:30
No legacy enum constant for MUSHROOM_STEW. Did you forget to define api-version: 1.13 in your plugin ...
哦哦哦，我懂了，还要在plugin.yml文件中加入这样一条：api-version: 1.13
谢谢!!!
